mapper.sql: orgid, vspid, topbranchid, name, code, status, bundleflag, pageflag, reviewflag, touchflag, liftflag, calendarflag, sscreenflag, mscreenflag, flowrateflag, tagflag, diyflag, meetingflag, videoflag, imageflag, textflag, streamflag, dvbflag, videoinflag, widgetflag, expireflag, expiretime, maxdevices, currentdevices, currentdeviceidx, maxdevices1, maxdevices2, maxstorage, currentstorage, copyright, description, backupvideoid, powerflag, poweron, poweroff, qrcodeflag, devicepassflag, devicepass, upgradeflag, volumeflag, volume, timezone, apps, logo, tags, createtime, createstaffid
mapper.select: select * from org where status='1' and name = #{name}
select * from org where status='1' and code = #{code}
mapper.delete: update org set status='9' where orgid = #{orgid}
mapper.update: update org o, (select count(1) as value, orgid from device where status='1' group by orgid) r set o.currentdevices=r.value where o.orgid=r.orgid and o.status=1
update org o, (select floor(coalesce(sum(size),0)/1048576) as value, orgid from video where status='1' group by orgid) r set o.currentstorage=r.value where o.orgid=r.orgid and o.status=1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
